name: Taphouse 2: The Taphousening
detailed_description:
Taphouse 2: The Taphousening is the ultimate bartending simulator. Serve drinks, play the slots, watch rowdy patrons fight each other! Everything at the counter is yet again yours to mess with - including your paying customers.

Features:
  • 🍻 Pour over 12 different kinds of beverages to your annoyed customers!
  • 💪 The classic Taphouse dwarves return with even more zany fantasy characters in tow. Elves and goblins join the party in the Taphouse!
  • 🎰 New tavern games such as Switcharoo, the classic Slots and classic Finnish Pajatso!
  • 🎮 Play in both PC and VR with support for all SteamVR headsets and (most) game controllers!
  • 🏠 Ten taverns of varying difficulty levels with multiple gamemodes!
  • 🧻 Epic Finnish memes of mixed quality!

short_description: Taphouse 2: The Taphousening is the ultimate bartending simulator. Serve drinks, play the slots, watch rowdy patrons fight each other! Everything at the counter is yet again yours to mess with - including your paying customers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD GPU Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
